title: 求这个怎么搞
author: 梦雨雨雨雨
txt_content:
求大神给说下 怎样才能使文字在空中漂浮





JYPT@FM]P~XDX8~_QCPUEYN.jpg

这个怎么搞

replies.author: a1466138924
replies.txt_content: 在MCBBS里搜索文字标语插件

replies.author: jiongjionger
replies.txt_content:
不用插件的话：
/summon EntityHorse [x] [y+55] [z] {Riding:{id:"WitherSkull",direction:[0.0,0.0,0.0]},CustomName:"你要显示的文字",CustomNameVisible:1,Invulnerable:1,Age:-1700000}
